original_text: The lot for the east fell to Shelemiah. They cast lots also for his son Zechariah, a shrewd counselor, and his lot came out for the north.
korean_text: 셀레먀는 동쪽을 뽑았고 그의 아들 스가랴는 명철한 모사라 모사를 위하여 제비 뽑으니 북쪽을 뽑았고

sentences.original_text: The lot for the east fell to Shelemiah.
They cast lots also for his son Zechariah, a shrewd counselor,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 그의 아들인 명철한 모사 스가랴를 위해 제비를 뽑았습니다.

sentences.original_text: and his lot came out for the north.
